column4: my lapy is craching, It crashes emediately when i logg in to gnome, it crashes after some use in fluxbox. a couple of minutes of use... What could that be??
I mean it stops responding to keyboard and mouse events..

check /var/log/messages and /var/log/xorg.0.log  - one of those should tell you something anyhow.. in my case it was irda support, whick only gets loaded after gdm so it looked like gdm had a problem. took a while to figure out :)
